title: About Me
text:
I’m currently pursuing my Master’s in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University. Previously, I earned a BBA in Finance from the University of Iowa. My academic background and internship experience have shaped me into a data-driven problem solver passionate about combining business strategy with analytics.



I was born and raised in Hangzhou, a beautiful city in eastern China known for its rich culture, tech innovation, and scenic landscapes. The image below shows the West Lake, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the most iconic landmarks of Hangzhou. Surrounded by historic pagodas, stone bridges, and lush gardens, West Lake represents the elegance and harmony of traditional Chinese aesthetics. It has been a source of inspiration for poets and artists for centuries—and continues to be a place I deeply treasure.



West Lake, Hangzhou







Apply data analytics and finance skills to drive decision-making in global businesses
Pursue opportunities in financial analytics, business intelligence, and strategy consulting
Contribute to impactful, cross-functional teams and data projects






Business problem-solving through data
Financial modeling, M&A, and global markets
Piano, swimming, and multicultural communication






Languages & Tools: Python, R, SQL, Excel, MATLAB
Platforms: VS Code, GitHub, RStudio, Jupyter, Google Colab, AWS
Business & Visualization: Power BI, Bloomberg, Finbox, Wind






Boston University, MS in Applied Business Analytics (2024–Present)
University of Iowa, BBA in Finance (2018–2023) | GPA: 3.19
